Justice Of The Peace Court.definition: a local court of limited jurisdiction usu. over minor civil and criminal actions

1.1: a local court of limited jurisdiction usu. over minor civil and criminal actions, small claims, and some felony preliminaries which is presided over by a justice of the peace and which usu. follows summary procedure
1.note: Justice of the peace courts were formerly common but now are used or remain active to some extent in only a few states.
